name: typing-master-rust
description: A competitive typing game built on the Solana blockchain with Next.js frontend.

scripts.deploy:localhost: solana config set --url localhost && cd program && solana program deploy target/deploy/typing_master_program.so
scripts.deploy:devnet: solana config set --url devnet && cd program && solana program deploy target/deploy/typing_master_program.so
scripts.deploy:mainnet: solana config set --url mainnet-beta && cd program && solana program deploy target/deploy/typing_master_program.so
scripts.setup:localhost: solana config set --url localhost && solana airdrop 10
scripts.setup:devnet: solana config set --url devnet && solana airdrop 2
scripts.full:deploy: npm run build:program && npm run setup:localhost && npm run deploy:localhost && npm run config:localhost && npm run dev:frontend
scripts.full:deploy:devnet: npm run build:program && npm run setup:devnet && npm run deploy:devnet && npm run config:devnet && npm run dev:frontend
